issues.title: Remove early-access disclaimer from the NOTICE files once the spec is released

Add find method that accepts properties to entity manager

Turn off QueryCache by default
Test framework should allow tests that are expected to fail to be checked in

"Encountered unmanaged object in persistent field" error while merging object tree
Disable QuerySQLCache by default

change pom.xml to publish sources as well.
